trigger_prototype.name: {#SQLINST}:{#DBNAME} exceed 60% of the maximum DB size on {$HOST.NAME}
{#SQLINST}:{#DBNAME} exceed 80% of the maximum DB size on {$HOST.NAME}
{#SQLINST}:{#DBNAME} exceed 90% of the maximum DB size on {$HOST.NAME}
{#SQLINST}:{#DBNAME} exceed 95% of the maximum DB size on {$HOST.NAME}
